channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Holywater Raises Additional $22 Million To Expand AI Vertical Video Platform
item.description: Fox backed Holywater raises $22 million to expand its AI powered vertical video streaming platform, scaling mobile-first episodic content, microdramas...

item.title: 2 Calm Responses To Avoid Defensiveness In Fights, By A Psychologist
item.description: If your responses in a disagreement with your partner aren’t aiding resolution, they’re often subtly increasing tension.

item.title: ‘We are Jerome Powell’: Gen Z finds an unlikely meme hero in the Fed chair via AI songs and fan edits
item.description: After refusing to bend to political pressure, Fed chair Jerome Powell is now the latest heartthrob.

item.title: Adaptability is the new job security and 4 more future AI trends from EY’s global chief innovation officer
item.description: As we begin a new year, there are five AI trends shaping C-suite conversations. Each one represents enormous opportunities and challenges.

item.title: Vail Resorts is having a very dry year: It reported a record‑low snowpack, forcing the company to lower its 2026 earnings outlook
item.description: Vail Resorts is having a very dry year: It reported a record‑low snowpack, forcing the company to lower its 2026 earnings outlook.

item.title: Recall expands to nearly 1M Frigidaire minifridges sold at Target over fire hazards
item.description: The recall of Frigidaire minifridges sold by Target expanded to nearly 1 million units after multiple fire reports resulting in property damage.

item.title: Miami-Indiana championship game has fans paying $30,000 a seat
item.description: President Donald Trump is expected to be among the nearly 65,000 in attendance.

item.description: Facebook password attacks have surged, experts warn. Here’s what you need to know.

item.title: 1.2 Billion LinkedIn Users Put On Alert After Policy Violation Attacks

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
